pages.text: This spell draws the life from nearby creatures into you, healing you and damaging them.$(br2)With modifiers, you can prevent yourself from damaging peaceful entities, target specific creatures, or distribute healing nearby allies.$(br2)$(info) The spell drains based on proximity, ignoring barriers.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:life_drain/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Damage:$() Damage dealt by this spell is considered wither damage. There is a $(spell:life_drain/IN_X/wither_chance) chance that damaged creatures will be given Withering $(spell:life_drain/ROMAN/wither_amplifier) for $(spell:life_drain/SECONDS/wither_duration).$(br2)$(bold)Healing:$() Every time an entity is damage, the caster is healed for $(spell:life_drain/HEART/heal) hearts. With the $(modifier:amplified_healing)$() modifier, an additional $(spell:life_drain/HEART/additional_heal) hearts worth of

healing is done. With the $(modifier:distributed_healing)$() modifier, this healing is done to nearby peaceful entities instead of the caster.$(br2)$(bold)Spirit Drain:$() With the $(modifier:spectral_drain)$() modifier, you have a $(spell:life_drain/PERCENT/spectral_chance) chance to drain life into yourself from spirits and ghosts in the Twilight grove.$(br2)$(bold)Targeted:$() With the $(modifier:targeted_drain)$(), you can drain a target up to $(spell:life_drain/distance) blocks away.

$(bold)Decreased Damage:$() With the $(modifier:lightened_load)$() modifier enabled, the damage you deal is halved, as is the healing you received.$(br2)$(bold)Fire:$() With the $(modifier:brimstone)$() modifier enabled, damaged entities are also set ablaze for $(spell:life_drain/fire_duration) and also take an additional $(spell:life_drain/HEART/fire_damage) hearts of fire damage. This additional damage does not heal you.$(br2)$(bold)Slowing:$() With the $(modifier:slowing_drain)$() modifier enabled, damaged entities are also

given Slowness $(spell:life_drain/ROMAN/slow_amplifier) for $(spell:life_drain/SECONDS/slow_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Underwater:$() With $(modifier:chthonic)$() modifier enabled, creatures immersed in water take double damage.
